content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column]

MODEL 3 Order Now on Tokopedia [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][vc_custom_heading text=”FEATURE DETAILS” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_tta_pageable no_fill_content_area=”true” autoplay=”5″ active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Section 1″ tab_id=”1653902762387-7bff5f39-148a”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[vc_empty_space height=”15px”][vc_column_text]

Easy Charging

Charge anywhere there is electricity. Most range used for daily driving can be topped off using the Mobile Connector Bundle and an approved outlet, or upgrade to a Tesla Wall Connector for the best home charging experience. For long distance travel, Model 3 adds up to 171 miles of range in just 15 minutes using Tesla’s Supercharger network, getting you back on the road, sooner.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[vc_empty_space height=”15px”][vc_column_text]

Sentry Mode

An exclusive protection feature called Sentry Mode continuously monitors the vehicle’s surroundings when you leave your Tesla unattended. When activated, Sentry Mode arms and uses the vehicle’s external cameras to detect and help protect against potential threats, similar to home alarm systems. Live Camera, available with Premium Connectivity, lets you remotely view your car’s surroundings while in park, and also honk, flash and talk through the car’s speaker. Live Camera is end-to-end encrypted and cannot be accessed by Tesla.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Section 2″ tab_id=”1652847297275-cd91d951-0417″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[vc_empty_space height=”15px”][vc_column_text]

Over-the-Air Updates

Model 3 gets better over time with frequent wireless software updates, bringing you new features, more entertainment, higher performance and range, increased comfort and even better safety.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[vc_empty_space height=”15px”][vc_column_text]

Tesla Mobile App

Remotely control and monitor your Tesla with Phone Key keyless driving, range & charging status, climate control, live GPS location and more. You can even schedule service and monitor your entire Tesla ecosystem, including power flow from Powerwall or from Solar Roof and Solar Panels.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_pageable][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row et_full_width=”true” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1650454573026{padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”INTERIOR OF THE FUTURE” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row et_row_padding=”true” et_column_align=”align-center”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1653016810708{padding-top: 75px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}”]

Glass Roof

The expansive Glass Roof provides passengers with a brighter, more spacious experience and a seamless view of the sky. Infrared and ultraviolet light is effectively blocked before entering the cabin, reducing heat and glare even when the sun is directly overhead.

Center Display

Access everything on the expansive 15-inch touchscreen including high-definition side and rearview camera views, navigation, movies, music, games and more. Your surroundings are visualized in real time while you drive to display speed limit signs, upcoming traffic control signals, pedestrians, cyclists and hazards in a 360-degree surround view.

Wireless Charger

Easily charge two phones at once on a non-slip, contoured surface. The integrated centre console offers deep storage space with two front and two rear USB-C charging ports, and tiered storage under the armrest.

All Vegan Interior

Softer than leather, yet far more durable and more stain-resistant, our custom-engineered seating material is fully vegan and significantly more sustainable than traditional seating materials, maximizing comfort and esthetics while maintaining our rigorous standards for durability and stain resistance.

Advanced Climate Controls

Airflow and temperature are controlled entirely through the display, allowing precise direction without ever seeing or touching a physical vent. On hot days, Cabin Overheat Protection ensures interiors always stay cool. In cold weather, pre-conditioning automatically warms the cabin and prepares the car’s battery to maximize range and efficiency.
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_raw_html]JTNDaWZyYW1lJTIwc3JjJTNEJTIyaHR0cHMlM0ElMkYlMkZkcml2ZS5nb29nbGUuY29tJTJGZmlsZSUyRmQlMkYxd3Fkdi13dmNQVmh5UWlEeTE0R1libGxXUWFseXhoSzAlMkZwcmV2aWV3JTIyJTIwd2lkdGglM0QlMjIxMDgwJTIyJTIwaGVpZ2h0JTNEJTIyNTAwJTIyJTIwYWxsb3clM0QlMjJhdXRvcGxheSUyMiUzRSUzQyUyRmlmcmFtZSUzRQ==[/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Expansive Storage

Model 3 features 23 ft³ of cargo space accessible through both the front boot and the automatically opening and closing rear boot. Taking advantage of the space traditionally occupied by bulky engines, fuel tanks and transmissions, the design of Model 3 enables disproportionately large amounts of storage for a car its size, while bolstering occupant safety through a more spacious, reinforced body and chassis.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_raw_html]JTNDaWZyYW1lJTIwc3JjJTNEJTIyaHR0cHMlM0ElMkYlMkZkcml2ZS5nb29nbGUuY29tJTJGZmlsZSUyRmQlMkYxR3lVNy10VTYyQk1PRmVqNjU2OFFsaEtadHdHNzI2SUglMkZwcmV2aWV3JTIyJTIwd2lkdGglM0QlMjIxMDgwJTIyJTIwaGVpZ2h0JTNEJTIyNTAwJTIyJTIwYWxsb3clM0QlMjJhdXRvcGxheSUyMiUzRSUzQyUyRmlmcmFtZSUzRQ==[/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Basic Autopilot

Included with every Tesla, Autopilot enables your car to steer, accelerate and brake automatically for other vehicles and pedestrians within its lane. Advanced safety and convenience features are designed to assist you with the most burdensome parts of driving, alongside driver assistance features such as emergency braking, collision warning and blind-spot monitoring.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row et_full_width=”true” et_row_padding=”true” et_column_align=”align-center” full_height=”yes” equal_height=”yes”][vc_column][vc_empty_space]
[vc_raw_html]JTNDaWZyYW1lJTIwc3JjJTNEJTIyaHR0cHMlM0ElMkYlMkZkcml2ZS5nb29nbGUuY29tJTJGZmlsZSUyRmQlMkYxd2dXTXlrUld1VVBBMHlieTdjdncyRldLdkVGb3BmREYlMkZwcmV2aWV3JTIyJTIwd2lkdGglM0QlMjIyMTYwJTIyJTIwaGVpZ2h0JTNEJTIyNTAwJTIyJTIwYWxsb3clM0QlMjJhdXRvcGxheSUyMiUzRSUzQyUyRmlmcmFtZSUzRQ==[/vc_raw_html][vc_raw_html]JTNDaWZyYW1lJTIwc3JjJTNEJTIyaHR0cHMlM0ElMkYlMkZkcml2ZS5nb29nbGUuY29tJTJGZmlsZSUyRmQlMkYxeGlqYzdnclVqbTF2aFUwV19tcTVUUjNqRXlTRDlMcnUlMkZwcmV2aWV3JTIyJTIwd2lkdGglM0QlMjIyMTYwJTIyJTIwaGVpZ2h0JTNEJTIyNTAwJTIyJTIwYWxsb3clM0QlMjJhdXRvcGxheSUyMiUzRSUzQyUyRmlmcmFtZSUzRQ==[/vc_raw_html][vc_raw_html]JTNDaWZyYW1lJTIwc3JjJTNEJTIyaHR0cHMlM0ElMkYlMkZkcml2ZS5nb29nbGUuY29tJTJGZmlsZSUyRmQlMkYxSlVUeXlLWWZXTlJMOC1aY3BNTjZwanozanBNRnZqek8lMkZwcmV2aWV3JTIyJTIwd2lkdGglM0QlMjIyMTYwJTIyJTIwaGVpZ2h0JTNEJTIyNTAwJTIyJTIwYWxsb3clM0QlMjJhdXRvcGxheSUyMiUzRSUzQyUyRmlmcmFtZSUzRQ==[/vc_raw_html][vc_raw_html]JTNDaWZyYW1lJTIwc3JjJTNEJTIyaHR0cHMlM0ElMkYlMkZkcml2ZS5nb29nbGUuY29tJTJGZmlsZSUyRmQlMkYxTkNVcWZMNnR5UG5XWGtaTlEyaEVXNVpucGJ2Nko0dlElMkZwcmV2aWV3JTIyJTIwd2lkdGglM0QlMjIyMTYwJTIyJTIwaGVpZ2h0JTNEJTIyNTAwJTIyJTIwYWxsb3clM0QlMjJhdXRvcGxheSUyMiUzRSUzQyUyRmlmcmFtZSUzRQ==[/vc_raw_html][vc_raw_html]JTNDaWZyYW1lJTIwc3JjJTNEJTIyaHR0cHMlM0ElMkYlMkZkcml2ZS5nb29nbGUuY29tJTJGZmlsZSUyRmQlMkYxMVhmSHFrQUI3a1pmWE5oY055bWFXQUZFUm1uMUM3ZkUlMkZwcmV2aWV3JTIyJTIwd2lkdGglM0QlMjIyMTYwJTIyJTIwaGVpZ2h0JTNEJTIyNTAwJTIyJTIwYWxsb3clM0QlMjJhdXRvcGxheSUyMiUzRSUzQyUyRmlmcmFtZSUzRQ==[/vc_raw_html]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”ENHANCED AUTOPILOT” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1653016776488{padding-top: 75px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row et_full_width=”true” et_row_padding=”true” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1652861866580{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #000000 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text animation=”animation bottom-to-top”]

Auto Lane Change

While driving on the motorway, Automatic Lane Change will position your car in the optimal lane to prepare for merges and exits while overtaking slow cars. Drivers are given clear insight to upcoming lane changes as well as customisation to Auto Lane Change functionality.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1652861721610{padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text animation=”animation bottom-to-top”]

Navigate on Autopilot

Automatic driving from motorway on-ramp to off-ramp includes automatic lane changes, Traffic-Aware Cruise Control with complete stopping and re-engagement, Autosteer, and overtaking slow cars in your lane.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1652861728945{padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text animation=”animation bottom-to-top”]

Autopark

Park with ease in both parallel and perpendicular parking spaces with a single button tap on the Centre Display. Model 3 will alert you to available parking spots by continuously monitoring the space around you.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1652861734626{padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text animation=”animation bottom-to-top”]

Smart Summon

Activated by the Tesla App, your parked car will come find you and even park or unpark itself in tight spaces. Smart Summon navigates complex parking situations while abiding by lane markings and stop signs, avoiding pedestrians and obstacles like traffic cones, rubbish bins and rogue shopping trolleys.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1652862756744{padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1652867938607{padding-bottom: 50px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”7362″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
